Topic.Title: Things go better with Coca Cola

Message.Msg: When you've just saved the country from going off the fiscal cliff, that's the time to reach for a frosty ice cold coke.

You don't read labels at all if you are singling out Coke for using HFCS. It's in a lot of food products, including some that are marketed as being "healthy". Nice try, though. I hear that eggs and coffee are once again being called dangerous for human consumption (changes every other week). Go tackle that. Or you could always try getting a life.

That's a stupid idea....warning labels would have to go on virtually every food//drinkiable item on the market....don't you read food labels\?. Oh!!!!!! How's about warning labels on BpA??? How's about warning labels on MSG??? How's about warning labels on anything containg sugar? How's about warning labels on product that didn't pass an FDA inspection???
